00025 {
00026   output.open("output.reader");

00030 {
00031   output.open("output.reader");

00041 
00042 void mknix::Reader::inputFromFile(char * fileIn)
00043 {
00044 
00045   input.open(fileIn);
00046 
00047   char keyword[100];
00048   char a; // For reading one-by-one the file.
00049 
00050   while(input >> keyword) {
00051 
00052     if(!strcmp(keyword,"//")) {
00053       do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00054     }
00055     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"TITLE")) {
00056       input >> theSimulation->title;
00057       output << "TITLE: " << theSimulation->title << std::endl;
00058     }
00059     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"GRAVITY")) {
00060       double value;
00061       input >> value; Simulation::gravity(0) = value;
00062       input >> value; Simulation::gravity(1) = value;
00063       input >> value; Simulation::gravity(2) = value;
00064       output << "GRAVITY: "
00065           << Simulation::getGravity(0) << ", "
00066           << Simulation::getGravity(1) << ", "
00067           << Simulation::getGravity(2) << std::endl;
00068     }
00069     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"DIMENSION") )
00070           {
00071       int value;
00072                
00073       input  >> value;
00074                Simulation::dimension = value;
00075                     
00076       output << "DIMENSION: "
00077              << Simulation::dimension << std::endl;
00078     }
00079     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"MATERIALS")) {
00080       char a;
00081       do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00082       output << "MATERIALS: " << std::endl;
00083       while(input >> keyword) {
00084         if(!strcmp(keyword,"ENDMATERIALS")) break;
00085         int num_mat;
00086         double young, poisson, density;
00087         input >> num_mat >> young >> poisson >> density;
00088         theSimulation->materials[num_mat] = *( new Material( young, poisson, density ) );
00089         output << "MATERIAL: " << num_mat
00090             << ",\n\t E = " << young << ", mu = " << poisson << ", density = " << density << std::endl;
00091         do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00092       }
00093     }
00094     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"CONTACT") )
00095           {
00096       std::string type;
00097       input  >> type;
00098                Simulation::contact = type;
00099       output << "CONTACT: "
00100              << Simulation::contact << std::endl;
00101     }
00102     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"VISUALIZATION") )
00103           {
00104       std::string type;
00105       input  >> type;
00106       if(type == "ON") Simulation::visualization = 1;
00107       if(type == "OFF")Simulation::visualization = 0; 
00108       output << "VISUALIZATION: "
00109              << Simulation::contact << std::endl;
00110     }
00111     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"SYSTEM")) {
00112       this->readSystem( theSimulation->baseSystem );
00113     }
00114     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"ANALYSIS")) {
00115       this->readAnalysis( );
00116     }
00117   }
00118 
00119 }
00120 
00121 void mknix::Reader::readSystem(System* system_in)
00122 {
00123   char sysTitle[30], keyword[20];
00124   input >> sysTitle;
00125   output << "SYSTEM: "
00126       << system_in->getTitle()
00127       << "."
00128       << sysTitle << std::endl;
00129 
00130   system_in->subSystems[sysTitle] = new System( sysTitle );
00131   while(input >> keyword) {
00132     if(!strcmp(keyword,"ENDSYSTEM")) return;
00133 
00134     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"RIGIDBODIES")) {
00135       this->readRigidBodies( system_in->subSystems[sysTitle] );
00136     }
00137     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"FLEXBODIES")) {
00138       this->readFlexBodies( system_in->subSystems[sysTitle] );
00139     }
00140     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"CONSTRAINTS")) {
00141       this->readConstraints( system_in->subSystems[sysTitle] );
00142     }
00143     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"LOADS")) {
00144       this->readLoads( system_in->subSystems[sysTitle] );
00145     }
00146   }
00147 }
00148 
00149 /*Changes Roberto*/
00150 void mknix::Reader::readRigidBodies( System * system_in )
00151 {
00152   char keyword[20];
00153 
00154   while( input >> keyword )
00155      {
00156     if( !strcmp(keyword,"ENDRIGIDBODIES") )
00157     {
00158       return;
00159     }
00160     /*Set Penalty method*/
00161     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"PENALTY") )
00162     {
00163       Simulation::constraintMethod = "PENALTY";
00164       output << "PENALTY set" << endl;
00165     }
00166     /*Set Augmented Lagrange method*/
00167     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"AUGMENTED") )
00168     {
00169       Simulation::constraintMethod = "AUGMENTED";
00170       output << "AUGMENTED set" << endl;
00171     }
00172     /*Set Alpha parameter*/
00173     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"ALPHA") )
00174     {
00175       input  >> Simulation::alpha;
00176       output << "ALPHA: " << Simulation::getAlpha() << endl;
00177     }
00178     /*Defined RigidBody:0D:MassPoint*/
00179     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"MASSPOINT") )
00180     {
00181       this->readRigidBody0DMassPoint( system_in );
00182     }
00183     /*Defined RigidBody:1D:Bar*/
00184     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"BAR") )
00185     {
00186       this->readRigidBody1DBar( system_in );
00187     }
00188     /*Defined RigidBody:3D:Generic*/
00189     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"GENERIC3D") )
00190     {
00191       this->readRigidBody3DGeneric( system_in );
00192     }
00193     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"OTRO") )
00194     {
00195     }
00196   }
00197 }
00198 
00199 void mknix::Reader::readRigidBody0DMassPoint( System * system_in )
00200 {
00201   char keyword[20];
00202 
00203   std::string rigidTitle;
00204   std::string nameNode;
00205   
00206   double xA, yA, zA;
00207   double mass;
00208 
00209   /*Read Rigid Body Title*/
00210   input  >> rigidTitle;
00211   output << "MASSPOINT: "
00212          << system_in->getTitle()
00213          << "."
00214          << rigidTitle << std::endl;
00215 
00216   while( input >> keyword )
00217   {
00218     if( !strcmp(keyword,"ENDMASSPOINT") )
00219     {
00220       break;
00221     }
00222     /*Read NodeA*/
00223     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"NODEA") )
00224     {
00225       nameNode = rigidTitle + ".NODEA";
00226       this->readNode( xA , yA , zA , nameNode );
00227     }
00228     /*Read Mass*/
00229     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"MASS") )
00230     {
00231       input  >> mass;
00232       output << "\t" 
00233              << rigidTitle << ".MASS: " << mass << endl;
00234     }
00235   }
00236 
00237   /*New Object: MassPoint*/
00238   int nodeA;
00239   nodeA = theSimulation->nodes.end()->first ;
00240 
00241   theSimulation->nodes[nodeA] = new Node( nodeA, xA, yA, zA );
00242 
00243   system_in->rigidBodies[rigidTitle] = new RigidBodyMassPoint( rigidTitle,
00244                                       theSimulation->nodes[nodeA],
00245                                       mass
00246                                       );
00247 }
00248 
00249 void mknix::Reader::readRigidBody1DBar( System * system_in )
00250 {
00251   char keyword[20];
00252 
00253   std::string rigidTitle;
00254   std::string nameNode;
00255   std::string energyKeyword; //chapuza
00256 
00257   double xA, yA, zA;
00258   double xB, yB, zB;
00259   double mass;
00260 
00261   /*Read Rigid Body Title*/
00262   input  >> rigidTitle;
00263   output << "BAR: "
00264          << system_in->getTitle()
00265          << "."
00266          << rigidTitle << std::endl;
00267 
00268   while( input >> keyword )
00269   {
00270     if( !strcmp(keyword,"ENDBAR") )
00271     {
00272       break;
00273     }
00274     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"OUTPUT") )
00275     {
00276       input >> energyKeyword;
00277       if( energyKeyword == "ENERGY" )
00278       {
00279         output << "OUTPUT: " << energyKeyword << endl;
00280       }
00281     }
00282     /*Read NodeA*/
00283     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"NODEA") )
00284     {
00285       nameNode = rigidTitle + ".NODEA";
00286       this->readNode( xA , yA , zA , nameNode );
00287     }
00288     /*Read NodeB*/
00289     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"NODEB") )
00290     {
00291       nameNode = rigidTitle + ".NODEB";
00292       this->readNode( xB , yB , zB , nameNode );
00293     }
00294     /*Read Mass*/
00295     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"MASS") )
00296     {
00297       input  >> mass;
00298       output << "\t" 
00299              << rigidTitle << ".MASS: " << mass << endl;
00300     }
00301   }
00302 
00303   int lastNode;
00304   lastNode = theSimulation->nodes.end()->first ;
00305 
00306   theSimulation->nodes[lastNode] = new Node( lastNode,xA,yA,zA );
00307   theSimulation->nodes[lastNode+1] = new Node( lastNode+1,xB,yB,zB );
00308 
00309   system_in->rigidBodies[rigidTitle] = new RigidBar( rigidTitle,
00310                                       theSimulation->nodes[lastNode + 0],
00311                                       theSimulation->nodes[lastNode + 1],
00312                                       mass
00313                                       );
00314 
00315   system_in->constraints[rigidTitle] = new ConstraintDistance(
00316                                       theSimulation->nodes[lastNode + 0],
00317                                       theSimulation->nodes[lastNode + 1],
00318                                       Simulation::alpha,
00319                                       Simulation::constraintMethod
00320                                       );
00321 
00322   system_in->rigidBodies[rigidTitle]->setOutput( energyKeyword ); //chapuza
00323 
00324 }
00325 
00326 void mknix::Reader::readRigidBody3DGeneric( System * system_in )
00327 {
00328   char keyword[20];
00329 
00330   std::string rigidTitle;
00331   std::string nameNode;
00332 
00333   std::vector<double> I(3);
00334   double Ixx, Iyy, Izz;
00335   double x0, y0, z0;
00336   double x1, y1, z1;
00337   double x2, y2, z2;
00338   double x3, y3, z3;
00339   double mass;
00340 
00341   /*Read Rigid Body Title*/
00342   input  >> rigidTitle;
00343   output << "GENERIC3D: "
00344          << system_in->getTitle()
00345          << "."
00346          << rigidTitle << std::endl;
00347 
00348   /*Read Rigid Body Attributes*/
00349     while( input >> keyword )
00350   {
00351     if( !strcmp(keyword,"ENDGENERIC3D") )
00352     {
00353       break;
00354     }
00355     /* Read Mass */
00356     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"MASS") )
00357     {
00358       input  >> mass;
00359       output << "\t" 
00360              << rigidTitle << ".MASS: " << mass << endl;
00361     }
00362     /* Read Ixx */
00363     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"I_XX") )
00364     {
00365       input  >> Ixx; I[0] = Ixx ;
00366       output << "\t" 
00367              << rigidTitle << ".I_XX: " << Ixx << endl;
00368     }
00369     /* Read Iyy */
00370     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"I_YY") )
00371     {
00372       input  >> Iyy; I[1] = Iyy ;
00373       output << "\t" 
00374              << rigidTitle << ".I_YY: " << Iyy << endl;
00375     }
00376     /* Read Izz */
00377     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"I_ZZ") )
00378     {
00379       input  >> Izz; I[2] = Izz;
00380       output << "\t" 
00381              << rigidTitle << ".I_ZZ: " << Izz << endl;
00382     }
00383     /* Read Point0 */
00384     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"POINT0") )
00385     {
00386       nameNode = rigidTitle + ".POINT0";
00387       this->readNode( x0 , y0 , z0 , nameNode );
00388     }
00389     /* Read Point1 */
00390     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"POINT1") )
00391     {
00392       nameNode = rigidTitle + ".POINT1";
00393       this->readNode( x1 , y1 , z1 , nameNode );
00394     }
00395     /* Read Point2 */
00396     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"POINT2") )
00397     {
00398       nameNode = rigidTitle + ".POINT2";
00399       this->readNode( x2 , y2 , z2 , nameNode );
00400     }
00401     /* Read Point3 */
00402     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"POINT3") )
00403     {
00404       nameNode = rigidTitle + ".POINT3";
00405       this->readNode( x3 , y3 , z3 , nameNode );
00406     }
00407   }
00408   
00409   int node0, node1, node2, node3;
00410   node0 = theSimulation->nodes.end()->first ;
00411   node1 = node0+1;
00412   node2 = node0+2;
00413   node3 = node0+3;
00414     
00415   theSimulation->nodes[node0] = new Node( node0, x0, y0, z0 );
00416   theSimulation->nodes[node1] = new Node( node1, x1, y1, z1 );
00417   theSimulation->nodes[node2] = new Node( node2, x2, y2, z2 );
00418   theSimulation->nodes[node3] = new Node( node3, x3, y3, z3 );
00419 
00420   /* New Object: RigidBody3D */
00421   system_in->rigidBodies[rigidTitle] = new RigidBody3D( rigidTitle,
00422                                       theSimulation->nodes[node0],
00423                                       theSimulation->nodes[node1],
00424                                       theSimulation->nodes[node2],
00425                                       theSimulation->nodes[node3],
00426                                       mass, I
00427                                       );
00428 
00429   /* Constant distance: L01*/
00430   system_in->constraints[rigidTitle+".L01"] = new ConstraintDistance(
00431                                       theSimulation->nodes[node0],
00432                                       theSimulation->nodes[node1],
00433                                       Simulation::alpha,
00434                                       Simulation::constraintMethod
00435                                       );
00436   /* Constant distance: L02*/
00437   system_in->constraints[rigidTitle+".L02"] = new ConstraintDistance(
00438                                       theSimulation->nodes[node0],
00439                                       theSimulation->nodes[node2],
00440                                       Simulation::alpha,
00441                                       Simulation::constraintMethod
00442                                       );
00443   /* Constant distance: L03*/
00444   system_in->constraints[rigidTitle+".L03"] = new ConstraintDistance(
00445                                       theSimulation->nodes[node0],
00446                                       theSimulation->nodes[node3],
00447                                       Simulation::alpha,
00448                                       Simulation::constraintMethod
00449                                       );
00450   /* Constant distance: L12*/
00451   system_in->constraints[rigidTitle+".L12"] = new ConstraintDistance(
00452                                       theSimulation->nodes[node1],
00453                                       theSimulation->nodes[node2],
00454                                       Simulation::alpha,
00455                                       Simulation::constraintMethod
00456                                       );
00457   /* Constant distance: L23*/
00458   system_in->constraints[rigidTitle+".L23"] = new ConstraintDistance(
00459                                       theSimulation->nodes[node2],
00460                                       theSimulation->nodes[node3],
00461                                       Simulation::alpha,
00462                                       Simulation::constraintMethod
00463                                       );
00464   /* Constant distance: L31*/
00465   system_in->constraints[rigidTitle+".L31"] = new ConstraintDistance(
00466                                       theSimulation->nodes[node3],
00467                                       theSimulation->nodes[node1],
00468                                       Simulation::alpha,
00469                                       Simulation::constraintMethod
00470                                       );
00471 }
00472 
00473 void mknix::Reader::readNode( double &x_in,
00474                                  double &y_in,
00475                                  double &z_in,
00476                                  std::string name_in )
00477 {
00478      input  >> x_in >> y_in >> z_in;
00479      output << "\t"
00480                             << name_in <<" : "
00481                 << x_in << ", "
00482                 << y_in << ", "
00483                 << z_in << std::endl;
00484 }

00488 void mknix::Reader::readFlexBodies(System * system_in)
00489 {
00490   char flexTitle[30], keyword[20], bodyType[20];
00491   std::string boundaryType("CLOCKWISE");
00492   std::string stringKeyword;
00493 
00494   while(input >> bodyType) {
00495     if(!strcmp(bodyType,"ENDFLEXBODIES")) return;
00496     else if( !strcmp(bodyType,"MESHFREE") || !strcmp(bodyType,"FEMESH") ) {
00497       char a;
00498       input >> flexTitle;
00499       output << "FLEXBODY: "
00500           << system_in->getTitle()
00501           << "."
00502           << flexTitle << std::endl;
00503       system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00504           = new FlexGlobalGalerkin( flexTitle );
00505       while(input >> keyword) {
00506         if( !strcmp(keyword,"ENDMESHFREE") || !strcmp(keyword,"ENDFEMESH") ) break;
00507         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"OUTPUT")) {
00508           input >> stringKeyword;
00509           if( stringKeyword == "STRESS" ) {
00510             system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->setOutput( stringKeyword );
00511             output << "OUTPUT: " << stringKeyword << endl;
00512           }
00513           if( stringKeyword == "ENERGY" ) {
00514             system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->setOutput( stringKeyword );
00515             output << "OUTPUT: " << stringKeyword << endl;
00516           }
00517         }
00518         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"FORMULATION")) {
00519           input >> stringKeyword;
00520           system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->setFormulation( stringKeyword );
00521           output << "FORMULATION: " << stringKeyword << endl;
00522         }
00523         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"BOUNDARY")) {
00524           input >> boundaryType;
00525           output << "BOUNDARY: " << boundaryType << endl;
00526         }
00527         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"NODES")) {
00528           do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00529           int totalNodes;
00530           int nodeNumber;
00531           double x, y;
00532           double z = 0.0; // Initialized for 2-D problems.
00533           output << "NODES:" << endl;
00534           input >> keyword;
00535           if(!strcmp(keyword,"RECTANGULAR")){
00536             int nx, ny; // number of cells in x and y direction
00537             double x1,y1, x2,y2; // begin and end of rectangle
00538             double Ax, Ay;
00539             int old_size = theSimulation->nodes.end()->first;
00540             input >> nx >> ny >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
00541             output << '\t' << "Rectangular patch: " << nx << " x " << ny << endl;
00542             Ax = (x2 - x1) / nx;
00543             Ay = (y2 - y1) / ny;
00544             output << "\tNode\tx\ty\tz \n";
00545             for (int i=0; i <= nx; ++i){
00546               for (int j=0; j <= ny; ++j){
00547                 theSimulation->nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*i + j] =
00548                     new Node( old_size + (ny+1)*i + j,
00549                       x1 + i*Ax , y1 + j*Ay, z );
00550                 system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->addNode( theSimulation->nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*i + j]);
00551                 output
00552                     << '\t' << theSimulation->nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*i + j]->getNumber()
00553                     << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*i + j]->getx()
00554                     << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*i + j]->gety()
00555                     << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*i + j]->getz() << std::endl;
00556               }
00557             }
00558             // build the boundary lines:
00559             for (int i=0; i < nx; ++i){ //bottom line:
00560               system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00561                 ->addBoundaryLine( system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode((ny+1)*i),
00562                                    system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode((ny+1)*(i+1))
00563                                  );
00564             }
00565             for (int i=0; i < ny; ++i){ //right line:
00566               system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00567                   ->addBoundaryLine( system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode(nx*(ny+1)+i),
00568                                      system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode(nx*(ny+1)+i+1)
00569                                    );
00570             }
00571             for (int i=nx; i > 0; --i){ //top line:
00572               system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00573                   ->addBoundaryLine( system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode((ny+1)*(i+1)-1),
00574                                      system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode((ny+1)*(i)-1)
00575                                    );
00576             }
00577             for (int i=ny; i > 0; --i){ //left line:
00578               system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00579                   ->addBoundaryLine( system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode(i),
00580                                      system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode(i-1)
00581                                    );
00582             }
00583 
00584             do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00585           }
00586   //         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"BLOCK")){
00587   //           int nx, ny, nz; // number of cells in x and y direction
00588   //           double x1,y1, x2,y2, z1, z2; // begin and end of rectangle
00589   //           double Ax, Ay, Az;
00590   //           int old_size = nodes.end()->first;
00591   //           input >> nx >> ny >> nz >> x1 >> y1 >> z1 >> x2 >> y2 >> z2;
00592   //           output << '\t' << "Block patch: " << nx << " x " << ny << " x " << nz << endl;
00593   //           Ax = (x2 - x1) / nx;
00594   //           Ay = (y2 - y1) / ny;
00595   //           Az = (z2 - z1) / nz;
00596   //           output << "\tNode\tx\ty\tz \n";
00597   //           for (int i=0; i <= nx; ++i){
00598   //             for (int j=0; j <= ny; ++j){
00599   //               for (int k=0; k <= nz; ++k){
00600   //                 nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*(nz+1)*i + (nz+1)*j + k] =
00601   //                   *(new Node(old_size + (ny+1)*(nz+1)*i + (nz+1)*j + k,
00602   //                     x1 + i*Ax , y1 + j*Ay, z1 + k*Az) );
00603   //                 output
00604   //                     << '\t' << nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*(nz+1)*i + (nz+1)*j + k].nodeNumber()
00605   //                     << "\t" << nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*(nz+1)*i + (nz+1)*j + k].getx()
00606   //                     << "\t" << nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*(nz+1)*i + (nz+1)*j + k].gety()
00607   //                     << "\t" << nodes[old_size + (ny+1)*(nz+1)*i + (nz+1)*j + k].getz() << std::endl;
00608   //               }
00609   //             }
00610   //           }
00611   //           do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00612   //         }
00613 
00614         }
00615 
00616         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"CELLS")) {
00617           output << "Cells: " << endl;
00618           double alpha = 2.5; // Initialize with usual value.
00619           int gPoints = 0; // Initialized to zero for error tracking
00620           input >> alpha;
00621           output << '\t' << "Dimensionless size (alpha_i): " << alpha << endl;
00622           do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00623 
00624           input >> gPoints;
00625           output << '\t' << "Number of Gauss Points: " << gPoints << endl;
00626           do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00627 
00628           input >> keyword;
00629           if(!strcmp(keyword,"RECTANGULAR")){
00630             int nx, ny; // number of cells in x and y direction
00631             double x1,y1, x2,y2; // begin and end of rectangle
00632             double Ax, Ay, dcx, dcy;
00633             int material_in;
00634   //           int old_size = cells.size();
00635             input >> material_in >> dcx >> dcy >> nx >> ny >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
00636             output << '\t' << "Rectangular patch: " << "material: " << material_in
00637                     << " dimension: " << nx << " x " << ny << endl;
00638             Ax = (x2 - x1) / nx;
00639             Ay = (y2 - y1) / ny;
00640             for (int i=0; i < nx; ++i){
00641               for (int j=0; j < ny; ++j){
00642                 system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00643                     ->addCell( ny*i + j,
00644                               new CellRect( theSimulation->materials[material_in],
00645                                   alpha,
00646                                   gPoints,
00647                                   x1 + i*Ax , y1 + j*Ay,
00648                                   x1 + (i+1)*Ax , y1 + (j)*Ay,
00649                                   x1 + (i+1)*Ax , y1 + (j+1)*Ay,
00650                                   x1 + (i)*Ax , y1 + (j+1)*Ay,
00651                                   dcx, dcy,
00652                                   x1, y1,
00653                                   x2, y2
00654                                 )
00655                             );
00656               output << "\t\t" << "Cell:" << /*old_size +*/ ny*i + j << endl
00657                   << "\t\t\t(" << x1 + i*Ax << ", " << y1 + j*Ay << ")" << endl
00658                   << "\t\t\t(" << x1 + (i+1)*Ax << ", " << y1 + j*Ay << ")" << endl
00659                   << "\t\t\t(" << x1 + (i+1)*Ax << ", " << y1 + (j+1)*Ay << ")" << endl
00660                   << "\t\t\t(" << x1 + i*Ax << ", " << y1 + (j+1)*Ay << ")" << endl;
00661               }
00662             }
00663             do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00664           }
00665   //         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"BLOCK")){
00666   //           int nx, ny, nz; // number of cells in x, y and z direction
00667   //           double x1,y1, x2,y2, z1, z2; // begin and end of patch
00668   //           double Ax, Ay, Az, dcx, dcy, dcz;
00669   //           int material_in;
00670   //           int old_size = cells.size();
00671   //           input >> material_in >> dcx >> dcy >> dcz >> nx >> ny >> nz >> x1 >> y1 >> z1 >> x2 >> y2 >> z2;
00672   //           output << '\t' << "Block patch: " << "material: " << material_in
00673   //               << " dimension: " << nx << " x " << ny <<  " x " << nz << endl;
00674   //           Ax = (x2 - x1) / nx;
00675   //           Ay = (y2 - y1) / ny;
00676   //           Az = (z2 - z1) / nz;
00677   //           for (int i=0; i < nx; ++i){
00678   //             for (int j=0; j < ny; ++j){
00679   //               for (int k=0; k < nz; ++k){
00680   //                 cells[old_size + (ny+nz)*i + nz*j + k] =
00681   //                   new CellRect( materials[material_in],
00682   //                                   alpha,
00683   //                                   gPoints,
00684   //                                   x1 + (i)*Ax ,   y1 + (j)*Ay,   z1 + (k)*Az,
00685   //                                   x1 + (i+1)*Ax , y1 + (j)*Ay,   z1 + (k)*Az,
00686   //                                   x1 + (i+1)*Ax , y1 + (j+1)*Ay, z1 + (k)*Az,
00687   //                                   x1 + (i)*Ax ,   y1 + (j+1)*Ay, z1 + (k)*Az,
00688   //                                   x1 + (i)*Ax ,   y1 + (j)*Ay,   z1 + (k+1)*Az,
00689   //                                   x1 + (i+1)*Ax , y1 + (j)*Ay,   z1 + (k+1)*Az,
00690   //                                   x1 + (i+1)*Ax , y1 + (j+1)*Ay, z1 + (k+1)*Az,
00691   //                                   x1 + (i)*Ax ,   y1 + (j+1)*Ay, z1 + (k+1)*Az,
00692   //                                   dcx, dcy, dcz,
00693   //                                   x1, y1, z1,
00694   //                                   x2, y2, z2
00695   //                                 );
00696   //               output << "\t\t" << "Cell:" << old_size + ny*i + j << endl
00697   //                   << "\t\t\t(" << x1 + i*Ax << ", " << y1 + j*Ay << ")" << endl
00698   //                   << "\t\t\t(" << x1 + (i+1)*Ax << ", " << y1 + j*Ay << ")" << endl
00699   //                   << "\t\t\t(" << x1 + (i+1)*Ax << ", " << y1 + (j+1)*Ay << ")" << endl
00700   //                   << "\t\t\t(" << x1 + i*Ax << ", " << y1 + (j+1)*Ay << ")" << endl;
00701   //               }
00702   //             }
00703   //           }
00704   //           do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00705   //         }
00706 
00707         }
00708 
00709         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"MESH")) {
00710           char a;
00711           do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00712           int material, nGPs;
00713           double alpha;
00714           int totalNodes, totalCells;
00715           int nodeNumber;
00716           double x, y;
00717           double z = 0.0; // Initialized for 2-D problems.
00718           output << "MESH:" << endl;
00719           input >> material >> nGPs >> alpha;
00720           output << "Material: " << material << endl;
00721           output << "Number of GPs per cell: " << nGPs << endl;
00722           output << "Influence domain factor (alpha): "  << alpha << endl;
00723           do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00724           input >> keyword;
00725           if(!strcmp(keyword,"TRIANGLES")){
00726             input >> keyword;
00727             output << "FILE: " << keyword << endl;
00728             std::ifstream meshfile( keyword ); // file to read points from
00729             int numberDumped; // read number but do not use it
00730             double x, y, z;
00731             int old_size = theSimulation->nodes.end()->first;
00732             std::map<int,int> nodesFile;
00733             meshfile >> totalNodes >> totalCells;
00734             output << '\t' << "Nodes: " << totalNodes << endl;
00735             output << "\tNode\tx\ty\tz \n";
00736             for (int i=0; i<totalNodes; ++i){
00737               meshfile >> numberDumped >> x >> y >> z;
00738               nodesFile[numberDumped] = old_size + i;
00739               theSimulation->nodes[old_size + i] =
00740                   new Node(old_size + i, x , y, z);
00741               system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->addNode( theSimulation->nodes[old_size + i] );
00742               output
00743                   << '\t' << theSimulation->nodes[old_size + i]->getNumber()
00744                   << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[old_size + i]->getx()
00745                   << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[old_size + i]->gety()
00746                   << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[old_size + i]->getz() << std::endl;
00747             }
00748             int elementType, node1, node2, node3, cellCount;
00749             output << '\t' << "Cells: " << totalCells << endl;
00750             output << "\tCell\tnode1\tnode2\tnode3 \n";
00751 //             old_size = theSimulation->cells.end()->first;
00752             cellCount = 0;
00753             for (int i=0; i<totalCells; ++i){
00754               meshfile >> numberDumped >> elementType;
00755               if(elementType == 203){
00756                 meshfile >> node1 >> node2 >> node3;
00757                 if( !strcmp(bodyType,"MESHFREE") ){
00758                   system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00759                     ->addCell(/*old_size +*/ cellCount,
00760                               new CellTriang( theSimulation->materials[material],
00761                                               alpha,
00762                                               nGPs,
00763                                               theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node1]]->getx(), theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node1]]->gety(),
00764                                               theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node2]]->getx(), theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node2]]->gety(),
00765                                               theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node3]]->getx(), theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node3]]->gety()
00766                                             )
00767                              );
00768                   output
00769                       << '\t' << /*old_size +*/ cellCount
00770                       << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node1]]->getNumber()
00771                       << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node2]]->getNumber()
00772                       << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node3]]->getNumber()
00773                       << std::endl;
00774                 }
00775                 else if( !strcmp(bodyType,"FEMESH") ){
00776                   system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00777                     ->addCell(/*old_size +*/ cellCount,
00778                               new ElemTriangle( theSimulation->materials[material],
00779                                                 alpha,
00780                                                 nGPs,
00781                                                 theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node1]],
00782                                                 theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node2]],
00783                                                 theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node3]]
00784                                               )
00785                              );
00786                   output
00787                       << '\t' << /*old_size +*/ cellCount
00788                       << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node1]]->getNumber()
00789                       << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node2]]->getNumber()
00790                       << "\t" << theSimulation->nodes[nodesFile[node3]]->getNumber()
00791                       << std::endl;
00792                 }
00793 
00794                 ++cellCount;
00795               }
00796               else if(elementType == 102){
00797                 meshfile >> node1 >> node2;
00798                 if(boundaryType == "CLOCKWISE"){
00799                 system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00800                     ->addBoundaryLine( system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode(node1-1),
00801                                        system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode(node2-1)
00802                                      );
00803                 }
00804                 else if(boundaryType == "COUNTERCLOCKWISE"){
00805                   system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]
00806                       ->addBoundaryLine( system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode(node2-1),
00807                                          system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->getNode(node1-1)
00808                                        );
00809                 }
00810                 else cout << ":::ERROR: BOUNDARY ORIENTATION UNKNOWN:::" << endl;
00811                   output << "\t Bound"
00812                       << "\t" << node1
00813                       << "\t" << node2
00814                       << std::endl;
00815               }
00816               else
00817                 do {meshfile.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00818             }
00819             do {input.get(a);} while(a!='\n');
00820           }
00821         }
00822       }
00823 
00824       system_in->flexBodies[flexTitle]->initialize();
00825     } // MESHFREE
00826   }
00827 }
00828 
00829 /*Changes Roberto*/
00830 void mknix::Reader::readConstraints(System * system_in)
00831 {
00832   char keyword[20];
00833   /*consTitle[30],*/
00834   std::string consTitle;
00835 
00836   while(input >> keyword)
00837   {
00838     if(!strcmp( keyword,"ENDCONSTRAINTS") )
00839     {
00840       return;
00841     }
00842     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"PENALTY") )
00843     {
00844       Simulation::constraintMethod = "PENALTY";
00845       output << "PENALTY set" << endl;
00846     }
00847     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"AUGMENTED") )
00848     {
00849       Simulation::constraintMethod = "AUGMENTED";
00850       output << "AUGMENTED set" << endl;
00851     }
00852     else if( !strcmp(keyword,"ALPHA") )
00853     {
00854       input  >> Simulation::alpha;
00855       output << "ALPHA: "
00856              << Simulation::getAlpha()
00857              << endl;
00858     }
00859     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"SPHERICAL"))
00860     { 
00861       /* Igual a una restriccion de distancia constante */
00862       std::string bodyTitleA, bodyTitleB;
00863       std::string nodeA, nodeB;
00864       
00865       /* temporary pointers to nodes */
00866       Node * p_nodeA=0;
00867       Node * p_nodeB=0; 
00868       char a;
00869       int i=0;
00870       input >> consTitle;
00871       output << "SPHERICAL: "
00872           << system_in->getTitle()
00873           << "."
00874           << consTitle << std::endl;
00875       
00876       while( input >> keyword )
00877         {
00878           if( !strcmp( keyword,"ENDSPHERICAL") )
00879           {
00880             break;
00881           }
00882           else if( !strcmp(keyword,"NODEA") )
00883           {
00884             /* get blank space */
00885             input.get(a); 
00886             while(input.get(a))
00887             {
00888               if (a == '.') break;
00889               else if (a=='\n') break;
00890               else
00891               {
00892                 bodyTitleA.push_back( a );
00893               }
00894             }
00895             if ( a!='\n' )
00896             {
00897               i=0;
00898               while(input.get(a))
00899               {
00900                 if (a == '.') break;
00901                 else if (a=='\n') break;
00902                 else
00903                 {
00904                 nodeA.push_back( a );;
00905                 }
00906               }
00907             }
00908           }
00909           else if( !strcmp(keyword,"NODEB") )
00910           {
00911             /* get blank space */
00912             input.get(a);
00913             while( input.get(a) )
00914             {
00915               if (a == '.') break;
00916               else if (a=='\n') break;
00917               else
00918               {
00919                 bodyTitleB.push_back( a );
00920               }
00921             }
00922             if (a!='\n')
00923             {
00924               i=0;
00925               while(input.get(a))
00926               {
00927                 if (a == '.') break;
00928                 else if (a=='\n') break;
00929                 else
00930                 {
00931                   nodeB.push_back( a );;
00932                 }
00933               }
00934             }
00935           }
00936         }
00937       if ( bodyTitleA=="GROUND" )
00938       {
00939         /* If the body is a rigidbody */
00940         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
00941             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) 
00942           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
00943             (  new Node( *system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( nodeB ) ) );
00944         /* The body is a flexbody*/
00945         else 
00946           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
00947               ( new Node( *system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( atoi( nodeB.c_str() ) ) ) );
00948         p_nodeA = theSimulation->groundNodes.back();
00949         p_nodeA->setNumber(-1);
00950       }
00951       if ( bodyTitleB=="GROUND" )
00952       {
00953         /* If the body is a rigidbody */
00954         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
00955             system_in->rigidBodies.end() )
00956         {
00957           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
00958               ( new Node( system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode(  nodeA ) ) );
00959         }
00960         /* the body is a flexbody */
00961         else
00962           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
00963               ( new Node( *system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( atoi( nodeA.c_str() ) ) ) );
00964         p_nodeB = theSimulation->groundNodes.back();
00965         p_nodeB->setNumber(-1);
00966 //         cout << theSimulation->groundNodes.size()
00967 //             << "(i)x=" << theSimulation->groundNodes[theSimulation->groundNodes.size()-1]->getx() << endl;
00968       }
00969       /* if it's not grounded */
00970       if( p_nodeA == 0 )
00971       {
00972         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
00973             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
00974           p_nodeA = system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( nodeA );
00975         else{ //the body is a flexbody
00976           p_nodeA = system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( atoi( nodeA.c_str() ) );
00977         }
00978       }
00979       /* if it's not grounded */
00980       if( p_nodeB == 0)
00981       {
00982         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleB) !=
00983             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
00984           p_nodeB = system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( nodeB );
00985         else //the body is a flexbody
00986           p_nodeB = system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( atoi( nodeB.c_str() ) );
00987       }
00988 
00989       system_in->constraints[consTitle]
00990           = new ConstraintFixedCoordinates( p_nodeA,
00991                                             p_nodeB,
00992                                             Simulation::alpha,
00993                                             Simulation::constraintMethod
00994                                           );
00995 
00996       output << "\t"
00997           << consTitle << "." << "NODEA: "
00998           << bodyTitleA << "." << nodeA
00999           << ": " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(0)->getNumber()
01000           << ": " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(0)->getx()
01001           << ", " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(0)->gety()
01002           << ", " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(0)->getz()
01003           << std::endl;
01004 
01005       output << "\t"
01006           << consTitle << "." << "NODEB: "
01007           << bodyTitleB << "." << nodeB
01008           << ": " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(1)->getNumber()
01009           << ": " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(1)->getx()
01010           << ", " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(1)->gety()
01011           << ", " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(1)->getz()
01012           << std::endl;
01013     }
01014 
01015       
01016       
01017       
01018       
01019     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"AXIS")) { // Igual a una restriccin de distancia constante
01020       std::string axisName;
01021       std::string bodyTitleA, bodyTitleB;
01022       std::string nodeA, nodeB;
01023       Node * p_nodeA=0;
01024       Node * p_nodeB=0; //temporary pointers to nodes
01025       char a;
01026       int i=0;
01027       input >> consTitle;
01028       output << "AXIS: "
01029           << system_in->getTitle()
01030           << "."
01031           << consTitle << std::endl;
01032       while(input >> keyword) {
01033         if(!strcmp(keyword,"ENDAXIS")) break;
01034         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"DIRECTION")) {
01035           input >> axisName;
01036           output << "DIRECTION: " << axisName << "-axis" << endl;
01037         }
01038         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"NODEA")) {
01039           input.get(a); //get blank space
01040           while(input.get(a)){
01041             if (a == '.') break;
01042             else if (a=='\n') break;
01043             else{
01044               bodyTitleA.push_back( a );
01045             }
01046           }
01047           if (a!='\n'){
01048             i=0;
01049             while(input.get(a)){
01050               if (a == '.') break;
01051               else if (a=='\n') break;
01052               else{
01053                 nodeA.push_back( a );;
01054               }
01055             }
01056           }
01057         }
01058         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"NODEB")) {
01059           input.get(a); //get blank space
01060           while(input.get(a)){
01061             if (a == '.') break;
01062             else if (a=='\n') break;
01063             else{
01064               bodyTitleB.push_back( a );
01065             }
01066           }
01067           if (a!='\n'){
01068             i=0;
01069             while(input.get(a)){
01070               if (a == '.') break;
01071               else if (a=='\n') break;
01072               else{
01073                 nodeB.push_back( a );;
01074               }
01075             }
01076           }
01077         }
01078       }
01079       if (bodyTitleA=="GROUND"){
01080         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
01081             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
01082           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
01083               (  new Node( *system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( nodeB ) ) );
01084         else //the body is a flexbody
01085           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
01086               ( new Node( *system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( atoi( nodeB.c_str() ) ) ) );
01087         p_nodeA = theSimulation->groundNodes.back();
01088         p_nodeA->setNumber(-1);
01089       }
01090       if (bodyTitleB=="GROUND"){
01091         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
01092             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ){ //if the body is a rigidbody
01093           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
01094               ( new Node( system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode(  nodeA ) ) );
01095             }
01096             else //the body is a flexbody
01097               theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
01098                   ( new Node( *system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( atoi( nodeA.c_str() ) ) ) );
01099             p_nodeB = theSimulation->groundNodes.back();
01100             p_nodeB->setNumber(-1);
01101 //         cout << theSimulation->groundNodes.size()
01102 //             << "(i)x=" << theSimulation->groundNodes[theSimulation->groundNodes.size()-1]->getx() << endl;
01103       }
01104       if( p_nodeA == 0){ //if it's not grounded...
01105         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
01106             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
01107           p_nodeA = system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( nodeA );
01108         else{ //the body is a flexbody
01109           p_nodeA = system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( atoi( nodeA.c_str() ) );
01110         }
01111       }
01112       if( p_nodeB == 0){ //if it's not grounded...
01113         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleB) !=
01114             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
01115           p_nodeB = system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( nodeB );
01116         else //the body is a flexbody
01117           p_nodeB = system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( atoi( nodeB.c_str() ) );
01118       }
01119 
01120       system_in->constraints[consTitle]
01121           = new ConstraintFixedAxis( p_nodeA,
01122                                      p_nodeB,
01123                                      axisName,
01124                                      Simulation::alpha,
01125                                      Simulation::constraintMethod
01126                                    );
01127 
01128       output << "\t"
01129           << consTitle << "." << "NODEA: "
01130           << bodyTitleA << "." << nodeA
01131           << ": " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(0)->getNumber()
01132           << ": " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(0)->getx()
01133           << ", " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(0)->gety()
01134           << ", " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(0)->getz()
01135           << std::endl;
01136 
01137       output << "\t"
01138           << consTitle << "." << "NODEB: "
01139           << bodyTitleB << "." << nodeB
01140           << ": " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(1)->getNumber()
01141           << ": " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(1)->getx()
01142           << ", " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(1)->gety()
01143           << ", " << system_in->constraints[consTitle]->getNode(1)->getz()
01144           << std::endl;
01145 
01146     }
01147     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"CLEARANCE")) { // Igual a una restriccin de distancia constante
01148       std::string bodyTitleA, bodyTitleB;
01149       std::string nodeA, nodeB;
01150       Node * p_nodeA=0;
01151       Node * p_nodeB=0; //temporary pointers to nodes
01152       char a;
01153       double tolerance=0.;
01154       int i=0;
01155       input >> consTitle;
01156       output << "CLEARANCE: "
01157           << system_in->getTitle()
01158           << "."
01159           << consTitle << std::endl;
01160       while(input >> keyword) {
01161         if(!strcmp(keyword,"ENDCLEARANCE")) break;
01162         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"TOLERANCE")) {
01163           input >> tolerance;
01164           output << "TOLERANCE: " << tolerance << endl;
01165         }
01166         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"NODEA")) {
01167           input.get(a); //get blank space
01168           while(input.get(a)){
01169             if (a == '.') break;
01170             else if (a=='\n') break;
01171             else{
01172               bodyTitleA.push_back( a );
01173             }
01174           }
01175           if (a!='\n'){
01176             i=0;
01177             while(input.get(a)){
01178               if (a == '.') break;
01179               else if (a=='\n') break;
01180               else{
01181                 nodeA.push_back( a );;
01182               }
01183             }
01184           }
01185         }
01186         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"NODEB")) {
01187           input.get(a); //get blank space
01188           while(input.get(a)){
01189             if (a == '.') break;
01190             else if (a=='\n') break;
01191             else{
01192               bodyTitleB.push_back( a );
01193             }
01194           }
01195           if (a!='\n'){
01196             i=0;
01197             while(input.get(a)){
01198               if (a == '.') break;
01199               else if (a=='\n') break;
01200               else{
01201                 nodeB.push_back( a );;
01202               }
01203             }
01204           }
01205         }
01206       }
01207       if (bodyTitleA=="GROUND"){
01208         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
01209             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
01210           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
01211               (  new Node( *system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( nodeB ) ) );
01212         else //the body is a flexbody
01213           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
01214               ( new Node( *system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( atoi( nodeB.c_str() ) ) ) );
01215         p_nodeA = theSimulation->groundNodes.back();
01216         p_nodeA->setNumber(-1);
01217       }
01218       if (bodyTitleB=="GROUND"){
01219         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
01220             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ){ //if the body is a rigidbody
01221           theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
01222               ( new Node( system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode(  nodeA ) ) );
01223             }
01224             else //the body is a flexbody
01225               theSimulation->groundNodes.push_back
01226                   ( new Node( *system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( atoi( nodeA.c_str() ) ) ) );
01227             p_nodeB = theSimulation->groundNodes.back();
01228             p_nodeB->setNumber(-1);
01229 //         cout << theSimulation->groundNodes.size()
01230 //             << "(i)x=" << theSimulation->groundNodes[theSimulation->groundNodes.size()-1]->getx() << endl;
01231       }
01232       if( p_nodeA == 0){ //if it's not grounded...
01233         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleA) !=
01234             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
01235           p_nodeA = system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( nodeA );
01236         else{ //the body is a flexbody
01237           p_nodeA = system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleA]->getNode( atoi( nodeA.c_str() ) );
01238         }
01239       }
01240       if( p_nodeB == 0){ //if it's not grounded...
01241         if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(bodyTitleB) !=
01242             system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
01243           p_nodeB = system_in->rigidBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( nodeB );
01244         else //the body is a flexbody
01245           p_nodeB = system_in->flexBodies[bodyTitleB]->getNode( atoi( nodeB.c_str() ) );
01246       }
01247 
01248       system_in->constraints[consTitle]
01249           = new ConstraintClearance( p_nodeA,
01250                                      p_nodeB,
01251                                      tolerance,
01252                                      Simulation::alpha,
01253                                      Simulation::constraintMethod
01254                                    );
01255 
01256       output << "\t"
01257           << consTitle << "." << "NODEA: "
01258           << bodyTitleA << "." << nodeA
01259           << ": " << p_nodeA->getNumber()
01260           << ": " << p_nodeA->getx()
01261           << ", " << p_nodeA->gety()
01262           << ", " << p_nodeA->getz()
01263           << std::endl;
01264 
01265       output << "\t"
01266           << consTitle << "." << "NODEB: "
01267           << bodyTitleB << "." << nodeB
01268           << ": " << p_nodeB->getNumber()
01269           << ": " << p_nodeB->getx()
01270           << ", " << p_nodeB->gety()
01271           << ", " << p_nodeB->getz()
01272           << std::endl;
01273 
01274     }
01275     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"OTRO")) {
01276     }
01277   }
01278 }
01279 /*Changes Roberto*/
01280 
01281 void mknix::Reader::readLoads(System * system_in)
01282 {
01283   char keyword[20];
01284 //   std::string loadTitle;
01285 
01286   while(input >> keyword) {
01287     if(!strcmp(keyword,"ENDLOADS")) return;
01288 
01289     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"FORCE")) {
01290       std::string sBody;
01291       std::string sNode;
01292       Node * pNode=0;
01293       char a;
01294       double fx, fy, fz;
01295 
01296       while(input.get(a)){ // we read the body...
01297         if (a == '.') break;
01298         else if (a=='\n') break;
01299         else if (a==' ') ; //get blank space
01300         else{
01301           sBody.push_back( a );
01302         }
01303       }
01304       if (a == '.'){ // we read the node...
01305         while(input.get(a)){
01306           if (a == '\n') break;
01307           else if (a==' ') break; 
01308           else{
01309             sNode.push_back( a );
01310           }
01311         }
01312       }
01313       if( system_in->rigidBodies.find(sBody) !=
01314           system_in->rigidBodies.end() ) //if the body is a rigidbody
01315         pNode = system_in->rigidBodies[sBody]->getNode( sNode );
01316       else //the body is a flexbody
01317         pNode = system_in->flexBodies[sBody]->getNode( atoi( sNode.c_str() ) );
01318 
01319       input >> fx >> fy >> fz;
01320 
01321       system_in->loads.push_back( new Force( pNode, fx, fy, fz ) );
01322     }
01323   }
01324 }
01325 
01326 
01327 void mknix::Reader::readAnalysis( )
01328 {
01329   char keyword[20];
01330 
01331   output << "ANALYSYS: " << std::endl;
01332 
01333   while(input >> keyword) {
01334     if(!strcmp(keyword,"ENDANALYSIS")) return;
01335     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"STATIC")) {
01336       double time;
01337       output << "\t"<< keyword << ":"
01338           << std::endl;
01339       while(input >> keyword) {
01340         if(!strcmp(keyword,"ENDSTATIC")) break;
01341         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"TIME")) {
01342         input >> time;
01343         output << "\t\t"
01344             << "TIME: " << time << std::endl;
01345         }
01346       }
01347       this->theSimulation->analysis.push_back
01348           ( new AnalysisStatic(theSimulation, time) );
01349 
01350     }
01351     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"DYNAMIC")) {
01352       char integratorType[20];
01353       double to, tf, At;
01354       double par1 = -1.;
01355       double par2 = -1.;
01356       double par3 = -1.;
01357       output << "\t"<< keyword << ":"
01358           << std::endl;
01359       while(input >> keyword) {
01360         if(!strcmp(keyword,"ENDDYNAMIC")) break;
01361         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"INTEGRATOR")) {
01362           input >> integratorType;
01363           if(!strcmp(integratorType,"NEWMARK")) {
01364             input >> par1 >> par2;
01365             output << "\t\t"
01366                    << "INTEGRATOR: " << integratorType << " " << par1 << " " << par2
01367                    << std::endl;
01368           }
01369           else if(!strcmp(integratorType,"NEWMARK-ALPHA")) {
01370             strcpy(integratorType, "NEWMARK");
01371             input >> par1 >> par2;
01372             output << "\t\t"
01373                 << "INTEGRATOR: " << integratorType << " " << par1 << " " << par2 << " " << par3
01374                 << std::endl;
01375           }
01376           else if(!strcmp(integratorType,"HHT-SIMPLE")) {
01377             strcpy(integratorType, "ALPHA");
01378             input >> par1;
01379             output << "\t\t"
01380                 << "INTEGRATOR: " << integratorType << " " << par1
01381                 << std::endl;
01382           }
01383           else if(!strcmp(integratorType,"HHT-GENERALIZED")) {
01384             strcpy(integratorType, "ALPHA");
01385             input >> par1;
01386             output << "\t\t"
01387                 << "INTEGRATOR: " << integratorType << " " << par1 << " " << par2 << " " << par3
01388                 << std::endl;
01389           }
01390           else{
01391             output << "\t\t"
01392                    << "INTEGRATOR: " << integratorType
01393                    << std::endl;
01394           }
01395         }
01396         else if(!strcmp(keyword,"TIME")) {
01397           input >> to
01398               >> tf
01399               >> At;
01400           output << "\t\t"
01401                  << "TIME: "
01402                  << to << ", "
01403                  << tf << ", "
01404                  << At << std::endl;
01405         }
01406       }
01407       this->theSimulation->analysis.push_back
01408           ( new AnalysisDynamic(theSimulation, to, tf, At, integratorType, par1, par2, par3) );
01409     }
01410     else if(!strcmp(keyword,"OTRO")) {
01411     }
01412   }
01413 }
